scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model.  The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer protected attributes like income levels or credit scores, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Develop a system to predict customer churn using a trained machine learning model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A bank uses a machine learning model to predict which customers are most likely to churn.  The model is trained on sensitive customer data, including financial information and demographics.
